de.tum.in.bluetooth.discovery

Class BluetoothThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.bluetooth.discovery.BluetoothThreadManager

  • public final class BluetoothThreadManager
extends Object
    This static class manages the Bluetooth action. It ensures that only one bluetooth action is executed at a time. Bluetooth operation are submitted to this class which executed them when a free slot if available.
    Author:
    AMIT KUMAR MONDAL

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleJob

        public static void scheduleJob(Runnable runnable,
                               int period)
        Schedules a periodic job such as the Device Inquiry
        Parameters:
        runnable - the job
        period - the period

      • stopScheduler

        public static void stopScheduler()
        Shutdowns the pool. No task can be submitted once this method is called.

      • submit

        public static <V> Future<V> submit(Callable<V> task)
        Submits a one-shot job returning a result. A Future object is returned to get the result. It is strongly recommended to NOT interrupt the computation.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the return type
        Parameters:
        task - the task
        Returns:
        a Future object to retrieve the result

      • submit

        public static void submit(Runnable runnable)
        Submits a one-shot job that does not return a result such as a Service Inquiry. the job will be executed when possible.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the job
